API DocumentationAll Packages | All Classes | Index | FramesNo Frames
Class JSArgumentsProperties | Methods
 
Packageaw.external.jsinterface
Classpublic dynamic class JSArguments

It’s a class used upon calling functions from Flash Player environment in JavaScript environment. In the usual case a function from Flash Player environment called in JavaScript environment gets the whole set of arguments transferred to the function in JavaScript. But such function cannot get access to the target object in the scope of which it was executed. JSArguments contains a list of function arguments and a reference to the wrapper object of the JavaScript object in the scope of which it was executed. For the function to receive the JSArguments objects the method should be registered with JSArguments.register();


Example 
package{
 import aw.external.JSInterface;
 import aw.external.jsinterface.JSArguments;
 
 import flash.display.Sprite;

 public class JSArgumentsExample extends Sprite{
  public function JSArgumentsExample():void{
   super();
   JSInterface.initialize(this);
   JSArguments.registerByTarget(this, this.test);
   // setup method
   JSInterface.window.test = this.test;
   // call method
   JSInterface.window.test();
  }
  protected function test(args:JSArguments):void{
   trace(args.target); // [object Window]
  }
 }
}

targetproperty

getDefinitionByTarget()method 
public static function getDefinitionByTarget(target:Object, name:*):Class

Returns the class, copies of which will be transferred using this method. If the method was not registered, it will return NULL.

Parameters
target:Object — The object that owns the method.
 
name:* — Maybe Function - refers to a method or a String or QName - the name of the method of transmited object.

Returns

register()method 
public static function register(method:Function, definition:Class = null):void

Register method by the link. A function registered by this method can be removed only by hand, otherwise it will never be removed.

Parameters
method:Function — Link to the method.
 
definition:Class (default = null) — Class which extends JSArguments, copies of which will be passed to the function.
registerByTarget()method 
public static function registerByTarget(target:Object, name:Class, definition:* = null):void

Registers the method that should accept a JSArguments object as an argument. This method allows indicating a class derivative from JSArguments, instances of which will be transferred to the indicated method. The functions registered with JSArguments.register() method will be automatically removed with the object when Garbage Collector will be clearing the memory.

Parameters
target:Object — The object that owns the method.
 
name:Class — Maybe Function - refers to a method or a String or QName - the name of the method of transmited object.
 
definition:* (default = null) — Class which extends JSArguments, copies of which will be passed to the function.
registerList()method 
public static function registerList(target:Object, ... args):void

Register a list of methods of one object which hosts as an argument object JSArguments

Parameters
target:Object — The object which owns transmitted methods.
 
... args — A list of methods or their names.
setArguments()method 
AS3 function setArguments(args:Array, target:JSDynamic = null):void

Set parameters of the object. The method is performed before sending the object to the function.

Parameters
args:Array
 
target:JSDynamic (default = null)
